xxl.core.math.functions
Class LinearCombination

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.Function<Number,Double>
      xxl.core.math.functions.AbstractRealFunctionFunction
          xxl.core.math.functions.LinearCombination
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, RealFunction
public class LinearCombination
extends AbstractRealFunctionFunction

This class provides a linear combination of two given RealFunctions as a RealFunction. That means this class constructs a new RealFunction f with f = w1 * f1 + w2 * f2 for given functions f1,f2 and weights w1,w2.

See Also:
RealFunction, AbstractRealFunctionFunction, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

LinearCombination

public LinearCombination(RealFunction f1,
                         double w1,
                         RealFunction f2,
                         double w2)
This class performs a linear combination of the given real-valued functions with two given scalars. That means, this class constructs a new RealFunction f supporting f = w1 * f1 + w2 * f2.

Parameters:
f1 - first RealFunction
f2 - second RealFunction
w1 - scalar of the first RealFunction
w2 - scalar of the second RealFunction

LinearCombination

public LinearCombination(Function f1,
                         double w1,
                         Function f2,
                         double w2)
This class performs a linear combination of the given functions with two scalars. That means, this class constructs a new RealFunction f supporting f = w1 * f1 + w2 * f2.

Parameters:
f1 - first real-valued function
w1 - scalar of the first function
f2 - second real-valued function
w2 - scalar of the second function
